user_stories.title: Build CSV parser with typed records
user_stories.description: Create a library that reads CSV files and parses them into typed Record structs. Support configurable delimiters and header detection. Handle malformed rows gracefully with line-number error reporting.
acceptance_criteria: Reports line number for malformed rows
Unit tests cover normal, headerless, and malformed inputs

user_stories.title: Implement JSON output writer
user_stories.description: Add a JSON writer that converts parsed records to JSON output. Support both pretty-printed and compact formats. Support writing to file or stdout.
acceptance_criteria: Converts records to valid JSON array
Writes to file when --output is specified
Unit tests verify both output modes

user_stories.title: Add CLI interface with clap
user_stories.description: Create a CLI that accepts input file path, optional output path, delimiter choice, and format flags. Add a --stats flag that prints row count, column count, and file size.
acceptance_criteria: csv2json input.csv converts and prints to stdout
csv2json input.csv --output out.json writes to file
csv2json input.csv --delimiter tab handles tab-separated files
Integration test runs the full CLI pipeline

technical_requirements: Use Rust with clap, serde, serde_json
